short_description: elhawasli is a nuts & seeds supplier based in broumana, lebanon.
long_description: fawzi hawasli and partners (fhp) has long been a very well-known and established foodstuffs import & export company with businesses covering the middle east, north africa, and europe. our company has been in the market of nuts since 1885, when fawzi hawasli the founding father opened his first branch in aley and for years to follow was the sole seller of nuts in the lebanese mountain area. dedication and high-standardized quality helped the business grow to 12 retail shops in different areas of lebanon by 1970. throughout the years, hawasli roasteries produced nuts as well as high quality chocolates out of our sister chocolate factory. by 1965, the company expanded from simple retailing to include importing and wholesaling of the best qualities of raw nuts to the largest nuts roasteries in lebanon. the company's ever-growing experience in the world of nuts positioned it as the leader in imports and exports of raw nuts and kernels in lebanon, and soon enough started exporting to the surrounding middle eastern, gulf, north african, and european countries.

generated_description: roastery hawasli, based in aley, mount lebanon governorate, is a prominent company specializing in the import and export of raw nuts and kernels. established in 1885 by fawzi hawasli, the company has grown to become a leading supplier in lebanon, exporting to the middle eastern, gulf, north african, and european markets. roastery hawasli offers a wide range of products including almonds, cashew nuts, pistachio kernels, macadamia nuts, corn, japanese and rice crackers, peanut kernels, pumpkin seeds, savory and spicy flavorings, and swiss and belgian chocolates. the company also produces lebanese sweets and brazilian coffee. with over 134 years of family history in the industry, roastery hawasli is dedicated to providing high-quality products and services.
